overview: Camille and Nix are a couple of 5 years on the verge of a breakup. They go on a trip to a secluded house on the mountain for a week, packed with issues they carried from the city. With a guilty conscience, Nix finally sees the pain that surrounds Camille due to her love or lack thereof. As they finally see each other eye to eye, another obstacle comes their way that threatens the status of their relationship for good.
tagline: Is love enough to go on?
title: Love Lost
